instructions: place the dinner plate on the table cloth
centre the salad plate on the dinner plate
place the folded napkin on the salad plate with the fold point toward the guests seat
place the wine glass on the top right of the table cloth
place the water glass at a 4 o'clock position to the wine glass
place the salad fork to the left of the plates with the prongs facing away from the seat
place the dinner fork between the salad fork &amp; the plates with the prongs facing away from the seat
place the dinner knife to the right of the plates with the blade pointing at the wine glass
place the soup spoon to the right of the knife with the bowl pointing at the water glass
